snippet: The league has served as a cradle for generations of Chinese leaders, who rose through it into the high ranks of the party....

headline.main: China Reins In Communist Youth League, and Its Alumni’s Prospects
headline.print_headline: China’s Youth League Is a Victim of Its Success

abstract: Chinese Pres Xi Jinping announces changes to Communist Youth League, incubator in which many politicians got their start; changes, which include shrinking league's ranks and tightening party control over members, suggest less powerful future for league.
lead_paragraph: The league has served as a cradle for generations of Chinese leaders, who rose through it into the high ranks of the party.

snippet: City reached the quarterfinals for the first time with a 0-0 draw against Dynamo Kiev, but the team lost Vincent Kompany, its captain, to a muscle injury....

headline.main: Despite Injuries, Manchester City Advances in Champions League
headline.print_headline: City Ignore Injuries to Secure Champions League First

lead_paragraph: City reached the quarterfinals for the first time with a 0-0 draw against Dynamo Kiev, but the team lost Vincent Kompany, its captain, to a muscle injury.

snippet: The suspension of Chapman, a reliever acquired in the off-season, for violating the league’s new domestic violence policy was negotiated and will not be appealed....

headline.main: Aroldis Chapman’s Stance Changed From Defiance to Acceptance
headline.print_headline: Yankees’ New Closer to Sit Awhile

abstract: Yankees pitcher Aroldis Chapman accepts 30-game suspension from Major League Baseball for his role in domestic violence episode; star closer, who is one of sport's hardest throwers, initially defended his behavior before yielding to new policy some hope will set standard for pro athletes.
lead_paragraph: The suspension of Chapman, a reliever acquired in the off-season, for violating the league’s new domestic violence policy was negotiated and will not be appealed.

snippet: Manchester City will be without playmaker David Silva for two to three weeks, ensuring he will definitely miss Wednesday's Champions League semi-final second leg tie at Real Madrid, manager Manuel Pellegrini said on Friday....

headline.main: Man City's Silva to Miss Champions League Semi Against Real
headline.print_headline: Man City's Silva to Miss Champions League Semi Against Real

snippet: A year after narrowly avoiding relegation, the Foxes beat 5,000-to-1 odds to win the Premier League title....

headline.main: The Remarkable Rise of Leicester City
headline.print_headline: Premier League’s Darkest Horse Makes Incomprehensible Run

abstract: Many soccer fans are calling surprise upset of Leicester City football club winning England's Premier League title one of most remarkable outcomes in soccer history; timelines of events that led to upset provided.
lead_paragraph: A year after narrowly avoiding relegation, the Foxes beat 5,000-to-1 odds to win the Premier League title.
